title: Salesforce workers outraged after CEO makes joke about ICE watching them
summary_full: Marc Benioff’s remarks criticized as employees were reportedly planning to urge him to cancel business with agencyMarc Benioff, the Salesforce CEO and co-founder, is facing growing criticism over a joke he made about US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) monitoring international employees during an event for the company.Employees publicly expressed outrage about Benioff’s comments in his keynote address at an internal conference in Las Vegas on Tuesday, and leaders at Slack, which Salesforce owns, have said he should apologize.
